pages.text: Manipulating time itself is a rare power... a power that is now yours!$(br2)With the $(item)Incantation of the Sun$() and the $(item)Incantation of the Moon$(), you can sacrifice either a $(marked)White Sheep$() (Day) or a $(marked)Black Sheep$() (Night) to set the time to either Midnight or Midday.

The ritual is performed on the $(l:manipulation/entry_altar)$(item)Altar$() and requires a greater power of Chaos, manifested in $(l:alchemy/entry_entropizing_catalyst)$(item)Entropizing Catalysts$(). $(br)In order to achieve results, the items to be affected must be tossed near the altar before the rite ends.
